content.description: Another steep start on big holds.  After the first bolt move up and left pulling though a bulge (crux).  After this the route tones down getting easier as you go.(5.6ish)
content.location: Just right of Caribou Barbie.  Shares its first and last bolts with Beckerheads.

content.description: Climb steep juggy rock through three bolts to a ledge.  The first bolt is a little high, but is clipped off a monster bucket.  Continue up an easy section to another ledge and the base of a right rising finger crack (gear).  Make a tough move from the top of the crack onto the thin face above (crux) and through some more bolts to the anchors.
content.location: The leftmost of three bolt lines left of a nasty looking chimney.  The start is steep and the first bolt is high.

content.description: Some interesting moves on this one.  Climb straight up to a juggy hueco.  Move up and right over a bulge (crux).  Made a lot easier by using a right foot in the nasty mud chimney...def a hard move without cheating though.  Pull onto a thin face through a series of pleasant moves trending up and left to join Obama Mama near the anchors.
content.location: Just left of a heinously nasty, wet chimney crack thing.  Shares first and last bolts with Obama Mama.

content.description: This is the first wall encountered as you approach from the parking lot.  Seperated from the Desert Shield Area by a steep vegetated gully.  The routes here are generally steep and juggy down low and thin and slightly less than vertical higher up.  Easy to hit this wall on the way in or way out with the approach being about 3 minutes.
